explanation: [0-0] A boy with golden hair, wearing a black T-shirt, sits facing left at a table cluttered with books and school supplies. He is completely absorbed in his phone, holding it in both hands. To his left is a closed white door. On the wall to the right of the door hangs a clock, with a white switch below it. A yellow rope runs from above the door to the phone. On the right is a brown cabinet.

[0-6] The boy continues playing on his phone with intense focus. Suddenly, he puts down the phone, turns swiftly to the left, grabs a pen, and begins writing rapidly in a book. At the same time, the door opens to the left, revealing a woman with long blonde hair, wearing pink overalls and a denim jacket. She stands in the doorway, left hand on the doorframe, right hand on the handle, looking at the boy and speaking to him. As she pushes the door open, the yellow rope attached to the phone rises, pulling the phone up towards the clock.

[6-10] The woman then looks to the right, noticing the phone hanging on the wall. She nods as she continues to speak.

[10-18] Shaking her head, the woman picks up the black scissors from the table and cuts the yellow rope, letting it spring upwards. The clock swings from the disturbance. She puts the scissors down, picks up the phone, shakes her head again, and walks back out the door, closing it behind her.

[18-22] The boy smiles triumphantly, puts down his pen, flips his book over to the right, picks up his phone from under it, and happily resumes playing on it.
